testcase.name: a employee can create a reimbursement request
testcase.system-out: Given a employee is on the login page.......................................passed When a employee logs in successfully........................................passed And they click on the create reimbursement request button on the home page..passed And they fill out the reimbursement request form............................passed Then employee should be on the home page....................................passed And be able to see the new reimbursement request............................passed

testcase.name: a user attempts to login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the home page............................................passed When a user types in a invalid "evan@gmail.com" and/or "word" and clicks the login button.passed Then the user should get an alert...........................................passed And after clicking ok.......................................................passed And still be on the login page..............................................passed

testcase.name: a user attempts to login with invalid credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the home page............................................passed When a user types in a invalid "df@gmail.com" and/or "1234" and clicks the login button.passed Then the user should get an alert...........................................passed And after clicking ok.......................................................passed And still be on the login page..............................................passed

testcase.name: a user attempts to login with invalid credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the home page............................................passed When a user types in a invalid "bb@gmail.com" and/or "DNE" and clicks the login button.passed Then the user should get an alert...........................................passed And after clicking ok.......................................................passed And still be on the login page..............................................passed

testcase.name: a user can login using their credentials
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the login page...........................................passed When a user types in their "el@gmail.com" and "word" and clicks the login button.passed Then the user should be on the home page....................................passed

testcase.name: a user can login using their credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the login page...........................................passed When a user types in their "df@gmail.com" and "trainer" and clicks the login button.passed Then the user should be on the home page....................................passed

testcase.name: a user can login using their credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the login page...........................................passed When a user types in their "dc@gmail.com" and "comedian" and clicks the login button.passed Then the user should be on the home page....................................passed

testcase.name: a user can logout by clicking the logout button on the home page
testcase.system-out: Given a user is already logged in and on the home page......................passed When a user clicks the logout button........................................passed Then the user should be on the login page...................................passed

Given a user is on the login page and already has a reimbursement request submitted.passed When a user types in their "mj@gmail.com" and "basketball" and then clicks the login button.passed And they click on the edit button for one of their reimbursement requests...passed And they fill out the "B" or "false" field..................................passed And they click on the update button.........................................passed Then the user should be on the home page with their edits made to either "B" or "false".passed

Given a user is on the login page and already has a reimbursement request submitted.passed When a user types in their "ts@gmail.com" and "iron" and then clicks the login button.passed And they click on the edit button for one of their reimbursement requests...passed And they fill out the "Pass" or "false" field...............................passed And they click on the update button.........................................passed Then the user should be on the home page with their edits made to either "Pass" or "false".passed

Given a user is on the login page and already has a reimbursement request submitted.passed When a user types in their "dc@gmail.com" and "comedian" and then clicks the login button.passed And they click on the edit button for one of their reimbursement requests...passed And they fill out the "" or "true" field....................................passed And they click on the update button.........................................passed Then the user should be on the home page with their edits made to either "" or "true".passed
